text: Shark Night (advertised as Shark Night 3D) is a 2011 American horror movie. It was directed by David R. Ellis and written by Will Hayes and Jesse Studenberg. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2011 horror movies Category:Movies about sharks Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s thriller movies Category:2010s 3D movies Category:American disaster movies Category:American horror movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Historical movies Category:Movies set in New Orleans Category:2010s disaster movies Category:Movies directed by David R. Ellis
title: Shark Night
